q.name: q
q.description: Search term to match against brand name. Partial match. Case insensitive.

methods.description: Lists all brands, along with their IDs, matching query term. Does not support wildcards. Limit is 10 results per query. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: Search Brands - Lists all brands along with their IDs - Credits: ã0

methods.description: API returns the status  of  the bulk  Job. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: ASE Bulk - Get job status - Credits: ã0

jobId.name: jobId
jobId.description: The id that would be used to query the status of the submitted job and download the final products

methods.description: API downloads the products as a file. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: ASE Bulk - Download the products as a file - Credits: ã0

methods.description: API returns the status  of  the bulk  Job. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: Bulk - Get job status - Credits: ã0

jobId.name: jobId
jobId.description: The id that would be used to query the status of the submitted job and download the final products

methods.description: API downloads the products as a file. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: Bulk - Download the products as a file - Credits: ã0

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesnât pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data

file.name: file

methods.description: This operation returns the catalog premium information for the specified product across all the stores where it is sold at. This consumes 18 credits per product returned.
methods.displayName: Bulk Product Details - Returns catalog premium information for a product - Credits: ãn x 18

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesnât pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data

storeId.name: storeId
storeId.description: Limits results to products sold at store with id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)

alsoSoldAt.name: alsoSoldAt
alsoSoldAt.description: Combined with storeId limits results to products sold at both storeIds and alsoSoldAt storeIds. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)

brandId.name: brandId
brandId.description: Limits results to products of brand with id int.  Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: Limits results to products of category with this id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)

startPrice.name: startPrice
startPrice.description: Combined with end_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end

endPrice.name: endPrice
endPrice.description: Combined with start_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end

availability.name: availability
availability.description: Limits results to either in-stock or out-of-stock items. Accepted values: 'IN_STOCK','OUT_OF_STOCK'

priceHistoryAvailable.name: priceHistoryAvailable
priceHistoryAvailable.description: Limits results to product that have price history available through the products/{:id}/prices endpoint. Accepted values: 'true','false'

priceChange.name: priceChange
priceChange.description: Limits results to products whose prices have been increased or decreased. Accepted Values: PRICE_INCREASED, PRICE_DECREASED, EITHER

onPromotion.name: onPromotion
onPromotion.description: Limits results to products which are on Promotion. Accepted values: 'true','false'

lastRecordedIn.name: lastRecordedIn
lastRecordedIn.description: Limits results to products which have price recorded in the last xx days. Accepted Value is a non-negative integer

storesCount.name: storesCount
storesCount.description: Limits results to products with at least a certain number of stores

applyFiltersTo.name: applyFiltersTo
applyFiltersTo.description: Specify the stores for which the offer level filter apply. Allowed values - storeId (apply filters to only stores in storeId), alsoSoldAt (apply filters to only stores in alsoSoldAt), storeIdOrAlsoSoldAt (apply filters to stores present in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), any (apply filters across all offers)

selectOffersFrom.name: selectOffersFrom
selectOffersFrom.description: Specify the stores for which offers will be returned in the response. Allowed values - storeId (select offers matching filters from storeId), alsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from alsoSoldAt), storeIdAndAlsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from stores in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), all (select all offers irrespective of matching or storeId or alsoSoldAt data)

methods.description: Returns a collection of products matching a specified query, along with a variety of statistics about the query results. Requires at least one of query, url, upc, mpn, sku, brandId, storeId, or categoryId. This consumes 18 credits per product returned.
methods.displayName: Bulk Search Products - Retrieves a list of products matching a variety of query parameters with their catalog info across stores - Credits: ãn x 18

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesnât pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data

sortBy.name: sortBy
sortBy.description: Sort by values - PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH, PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW, MOST_RECENT.

facetBy.name: facetBy
facetBy.description: Facet by values - storeId, brandId, categoryId. Should be a comma separated list of allowed values.

pageNumber.name: pageNumber
pageNumber.description: The page number of the result set to return. 10 results per page.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: Number of results per page. Allowed values - 10, 20, 50.

Allowed values - storeId (apply filters to only stores in storeId), alsoSoldAt (apply filters to only stores in alsoSoldAt), storeIdOrAlsoSoldAt (apply filters to stores present in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), any (apply filters across all offers)

selectOffersFrom.name: selectOffersFrom
selectOffersFrom.description: Specify the stores for which offers will be returned in the response. Allowed values - storeId (select offers matching filters from storeId), alsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from alsoSoldAt), storeIdAndAlsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from stores in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), all (select all offers irrespective of matching or storeId or alsoSoldAt data)

methods.description: Returns a collection of products matching a specified query, along with a variety of statistics about the query results. Requires at least one of query, url, upc, mpn, sku, brandId, storeId, or categoryId. This consumes 4 credits per product returned.
methods.displayName: Bulk Search Products - Retrieves a list of products matching a variety of query parameters with offers info from a store - Credits: ãn x 4

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesnât pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data

storeId.name: storeId
storeId.description: Limits results to products sold at store with id.

alsoSoldAt.name: alsoSoldAt
alsoSoldAt.description: Combined with storeId limits results to products sold at both storeIds and alsoSoldAt storeIds. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)

brandId.name: brandId
brandId.description: Limits results to products of brand with id int.  Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: Limits results to products of category with this id. Support multiple values (acts as OR operator

upc.name: upc
upc.description: Limit results to products with this UPC

mpn.name: mpn
mpn.description: Limit results to products with this MPN

sku.name: sku
sku.description: Limit results to products with this SKU

startPrice.name: startPrice
startPrice.description: Combined with end_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end

endPrice.name: endPrice
endPrice.description: Combined with start_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end

availability.name: availability
availability.description: Limits results to either in-stock or out-of-stock items. Accepted values: 'IN_STOCK','OUT_OF_STOCK'

priceHistoryAvailable.name: priceHistoryAvailable
priceHistoryAvailable.description: Limits results to product that have price history available through the products/{:id}/prices endpoint. Accepted values: 'true','false'

priceChange.name: priceChange
priceChange.description: Limits results to products whose prices have been increased or decreased. Accepted Values: PRICE_INCREASED, PRICE_DECREASED, EITHER

onPromotion.name: onPromotion
onPromotion.description: Limits results to products which are on Promotion. Accepted values: 'true','false'

lastRecordedIn.name: lastRecordedIn
lastRecordedIn.description: Limits results to products which have price recorded in the last xx days. Accepted Value is a non-negative integer

storesCount.name: storesCount
storesCount.description: Limits results to products with at least a certain number of stores

applyFiltersTo.name: applyFiltersTo
applyFiltersTo.description: Specify the stores for which the offer level filter apply. Allowed values - storeId (apply filters to only stores in storeId), alsoSoldAt (apply filters to only stores in alsoSoldAt), storeIdOrAlsoSoldAt (apply filters to stores present in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), any (apply filters across all offers)

selectOffersFrom.name: selectOffersFrom
selectOffersFrom.description: Specify the stores for which offers will be returned in the response. Allowed values - storeId (select offers matching filters from storeId), alsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from alsoSoldAt), storeIdAndAlsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from stores in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), all (select all offers irrespective of matching or storeId or alsoSoldAt data)

sortBy.name: sortBy
sortBy.description: Sort by values - PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH, PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW, MOST_RECENT.

facetBy.name: facetBy
facetBy.description: Facet by values - storeId, brandId, categoryId. Should be a comma separated list of allowed values.

pageNumber.name: pageNumber
pageNumber.description: The page number of the result set to return. 10 results per page.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: Number of results per page. Allowed values - 10, 20, 50.

methods.description: Returns a collection of products matching a specified query, along with a variety of statistics about the query results. Requires at least one of query, url, upc, mpn, sku, brandId, storeId, or categoryId. This consumes 4 credits per product returned.
methods.displayName: Search Products - Retrieves a list of products matching a variety of query parameters with offers info from a store - Credits: ãn x 4

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesnât pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data

storeId.name: storeId
storeId.description: Limits results to offers from this store

pageNumber.name: pageNumber
pageNumber.description: The page number of the result set to return. 50 results per page, plus similar items

methods.description: This operation returns the offers standard information for the specified product from a single storeId. This consumes 4 credits.
methods.displayName: Product Details - Returns offers standard information for a product from a single storeId - Credits: ã4

mpid.name: mpid
mpid.description: The Indix product identifier - should be a 32-digit HEX value retrieved via the Product Search API

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code.

q.name: q
q.description: Query term for which suggestions are to be provided

methods.description: Lists all search suggestions matching the query term. Does not support wildcards. Limit 100 results per query. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: Search Suggestions - Lists all product search suggestions - Credits: ã0

q.name: q
q.description: Search term to match against store name or the store domain. Partial match. Case insensitive

methods.description: Lists all stores, along with their IDs, matching the query term. Does not support wildcards. Limit 10 results per query. This API does not consume any credits.
methods.displayName: Search Stores - Lists all stores along with their IDs - Credits: ã0

countryCode.name: countryCode
countryCode.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesnât pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data

file.name: file

methods.description: This operation returns the summary information for the specified product. This consumes 2 credits per product returned.
methods.displayName: Bulk Product Details - Returns summary information for a product - Credits: ãn x 2
